## GeoJsonDataProvider.(constructor)

Constructs a new `GeoJsonDataProvider`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(name: string, input: URL | GeoJson, options?: GeoJsonDataProviderOptions);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Name to be used to reference this <code>DataProvider</code> |
|  input | URL \| [GeoJson](./harp-datasource-protocol.geojson.md) | URL of the GeoJSON, or a GeoJSON. |
|  options | [GeoJsonDataProviderOptions](./harp-omv-datasource.geojsondataprovideroptions.md) | Optional |
